text: Guy Lutgen (19 April 1936 – 26 July 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was a member of Christian Social Party. He was the Minister of Agriculture from 1988 to 1999. He was a Senator between 1977 to 1995. Lutgen was Mayor of Bastogne (1976–2000). Lutgen was born in Noville in 1936 and died in Baillonville in 2020, aged 84.Guy Lutgen, ancien ministre et bourgmestre de Bastogne, est mort ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Parti social-chrétien politicians Category:People from Luxembourg (Belgium) Category:Walloon politicians
title: Guy Lutgen
